Class CompanyRepView

Object
CompanyRepView
public class CompanyRepView extends Object
View class for Company Representative interface. VIEW LAYER: Responsible ONLY for displaying information and getting user input. - Shows menus and data - Formats output - Gets user input DOES NOT contain business logic.
